description:
You've probably seen this guy playing over on NextDoorBuddies, so it was only a matter of time before he made it onto NextDoorMale.

Chad Clovis is a 24 year old blonde, in shape Physical Education teacher at a local highschool. He also has a huge sexual appetite and classifies himself as an exhibitionist.

For this solo scene, Chad will be doing his thing out on the farm. We have a tractor that he'll be using as a prop before he heads inside to shower off. When it's time to chase down that satisfying orgasm, Chad chooses to do it on the bed, where it's much more comfortable to take a nap after blowing your load.

Enjoy!
title: Chad Clovis
